name: I Witness
description:
Play as a semi-sentient AI spyware, see through the eyes of a cast of secretive individuals, discover their conspiratorial activities and see how their schemes play out.

This was a final project for one of my classes this semester! Not game a week, surprisingly. The word limit was quite small and I wasn't able to get this game as perfect as it could be, but I hope you enjoy it nonetheless!
